A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi turned out to be everything I wanted and everything I didn't know I wanted. Surprising twists and turns and tuly amazing spectacle. It was never going to please everyone\, with the growing pressure of expectation and how the fans have in their own mind how it will play out. But for me\, for any expectation that wasn't met\, they blew my mind by taking risks and making new a fresh decisions. 

This is a movie about character and their journeys. About choices\, past and present and consequences. Yes there is amazing set pieces\, beautifully executed wide shots that deserve to be displayed on your wall. I can see this getting better with every watch. 

There is one storyline that drags and almost proved pointless. But the actors and characters are still likeable enough to keep them fun enough.

After The Force Awakens I was so glad Star Wars was back\, after The Last Jedi I am excited for where Star Wars is going.
